author: breast
glottocode: 1. woman's breasts, 2. milk [more often the latter, although originally it meant the former]

author: to scratch
glottocode: to scratch (for the purpose of hurting)

author: to pound, beat
glottocode: to beat, hit, strike [bell, drum, dog, etc.]

author: big
glottocode: big, but limited in use like Indonesia raya, jalan raya (boulevard/big road), hari raya (holiday/big day), jagat raya (universe), etc

author: to climb
glottocode: 1. ascend [person on stairs, balloon in air, bubble in water], 2. mount/ride [a horse, carriage, car, train, airplane]

author: to climb
glottocode: to climb [up a slope, a mountain]

author: One
glottocode: 'one' (only used to express the oneness of God)
